name: Two-Fisted Drinker, Mythic

sections.body: You can draw two potions or other beverages—mundane or magical—from a pouch, bandolier, or similar holder (but not from a backpack) as a move action. As a standard action, you can drink two potions or other beverages. You must have two free hands to use this feat.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You can pound down drinks with amazing verve.
